Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.Abstract

Class AbstractBeam

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.Abstract.AbstractBeam
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants
Direct Known Subclasses:
Beam
public abstract class AbstractBeam extends Object implements Constants
This class is a subclass for a Beam object.
It defines the abstract draw method.
